channel.title: Vistex
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]FAN OF VISTEX? CHECK OUT OUR CURRENT PROJECT:[/b][/size] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594169.msg4188270.html#msg4188270]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594169.msg4188270.html#msg4188270[/url] [center]Vistex[/center] [center][img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/fm3st1.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Hey guys, I guess it is time I release Vistex, a project me and my mate have been working on for quite some time. Before people start asking, no this is not the current base we are hosting. This is the project from my dev thread. Also this is my first release..[/center] My dev thread: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535399.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535399.0.html[/url] (Currently hosting) [center]
Features: - 24.7 Uptime - Vote4Points - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - x2 Point Weekend - Active helpful staff - 2 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - Summoning - 100% working leeches - Perfect Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - 100% Runescape Hitmarkers - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock -All New Items -Many Areas to pk - Staff of light Special -Alot More..
[/center] [center]Media:[/center] [center]508 Maps: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/ml79j7.jpg[/img] Multi Barrage [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/wcfe68.jpg[/img] Better Chars: [img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/b5jm9x.jpg[/img] Claws: [img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/14mys0n.jpg[/img] Range Hitsplat: [img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/15i3hg5.jpg[/img] Ags Spec: [img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2cdizp3.jpg[/img] Korasi Spec: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/30n7j8h.jpg[/img] Magic Hitsplat: [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/9h2kh2.jpg[/img] Some Items: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/244p14x.jpg[/img] New Right Clicks: [img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2414ebs.jpg[/img] New prayer Book: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/2wod4ro.jpg[/img] New Curses Book: [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/33a4gvn.jpg[/img] New Emote Tab: [img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/keb67l.jpg[/img] Quest Tab: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/dzi801.jpg[/img] Shop: [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/dgm0qu.jpg[/img] GameFreame: [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/73lzzo.png[/img] Char: [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/hrk5rn.png[/img] [/center] [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kVb_7oH2HtQ&context=C390955eADOEgsToPDskJj6sL1vjvE-_HjfM7GZZO_[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVdygEbBa28&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/Y3a2veMjJrE[/youtube][/center] [center] Credits: -Me -Stefano -Sanity -Creators of Xyle[/center] [center]Also for the people who are going to say: "leeched" "nun changed" and all that shit. Here are logs:
-New Right Clicks. -New GameFrame. -Fixed Wildy Ditch. -Added Curses Adjustments. -Added Pk point interface -Added Proper amount formatting in examine info. -Added ::chatcolor -Added A better Debugging Command -Added 699 Attack Bar -Banking Now Works. -Wildy Ditch now Working -Added New Prayerbook -Npc's are now correct color -Better Char models -Changed NpC Information -Farming has been greatly improved. Near perfect -Added New Player Statistic Interface -Added KDR -Added Timed Mutes -Removed Crush bonus from quest tab -Removed Flames From Client -Added addHover & AddHovered Methods -New Shop Interface -Added Logout button -Added Random Death Messages -Added New Link interface -Cleaned up quest tab -Added Zombie Minigame -Added Skill cape emotes -New Emote Buttons added -Added Hover Tooltip over NPC's, Objects, & Players -Added a Veteran Rank -Added Donator Rank -Cleaned Out commands -Cleaned Out all files, junk is now gone. More organized -Added Teletabs -Added Votepoints -Added Votepoints Shop -Moved more Npcs home -Fixed a duel arena bug -Added a find item command -Added a perfect cache downloader -Added G.e Interface -Added New Highscores -Added Killstreak system -Added New artifacts system -Added a small quest -Added ban pins -Added Casket System -Bad character names deletion system -Improved Jad -Improved Domination Tower -Added Vote button -Prices are updated -Player inventory drops faster when player dies -Message appears when trade is declined and accepted -Correct animations spells -Added New Alert system -New bork system -Correct Exp when using no weapons -Correct Exp when using weapons -prevent from action processing if walked away without reaching it -Improved special bar -Getting stuck in duelling after victory, fixed -Switching magic and still being able to use tb while using ancients fixed -Get 1 level of range then you can train to 99 mage with out one combat level fixed -Added Vote Button Ingame -Made Npcs in G.e Correct Position -Made Quest tab open correct interfaces and correct spawns -Cleaned out quest tab (more organised) -New option tab -Added forfeiting in duel arena -Added new promo vid -Added Face North -Added "100k/m/b" Amount Input Modification -Bankers Now have diologues -Teleporter Npc Now teleports you to correct location -Fixed death messages -Removed pvp drops -New death messages -Fixed up Bork -Added Nomad -Added new potion messeges -Potion emptying with message -New special bar -Fixed up rocktail glitch -Now can't sell items to shops -New Pk Tab -Client Now runs faster -New Friends tab -Gameframe fully working, no glitches, off sprites -New Login requirements -Added loyalty titles -Money pouch server sided -Money pouch client sided -Fixed money pouch dupe -All Bank dupes fixed. -PERFECT SWITCHING! -Added Nex? lol.. npc 5248 -Fixed alch dupe -capitilization on client login -562 Hotkeys added -Added Dicing item 15084 -Players do not recieve pkp, a kill count, or a death count in duel now -After you kill someone in duel, your stats reset -Right Click reply now works :P -New Equipment Tab Added -Equipment screen works with the equipment tab -New Donator interface -New Loyalty interface -New Teleport interface -New donotor interface for donators -Donotors interface 2 -Note tab -Added a spawn interface -Added Modified Cycle Based Event Handler -Cleaned out process as much as possible -Npcs now have block emotes
Download Links: Client & Source Package. ^.^ [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5exb88ekupfp2ab]http://www.mediafire.com/?5exb88ekupfp2ab[/url] Cache: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qw0gc3huuvm9c1w]http://www.mediafire.com/?qw0gc3huuvm9c1w[/url] IMPORTANT NOTES: -THIS HAS MYSQL ENABLED.. SO DO NOT BE SURPRISED WHEN YOU GET ERRORS AS YOU START SERVER. -THE GAMEFRAME HAS BEEN CHANGED TO THE DEFAULT ONE. SO DON'T FREAK OUT.[/center]
